name: Capital City
description: The seat of government and center of political power attracts the most influential people and creates opportunities for political intrigue. The strict security and surveillance make it dangerous for criminals, while the concentration of power creates intense rivalries and opportunities for advancement.
atmosphere: Official carriages clatter on cobblestones while uniformed guards patrol marble-columned buildings. The air carries polished brass, wax seals, and authority. Checkpoints and government buildings dominate every district while official banners hang from palace walls. Bureaucrats hurry past carrying sealed documents and scrolls.
